text: mūsa tanṟe janatayēāṭu paṟañña sandarbhaṁ: "allāhu niṅṅaḷkkēkiya anugrahaṅṅaḷ ōrkkuka: phaṟavēānṟe āḷkkāril ninn avan niṅṅaḷe rakṣicca kāryaṁ. avar niṅṅaḷe kaṭhinamāyi pīḍippikkukayāyirunnu. niṅṅaḷuṭe āṇmakkaḷe aṟukeāla naṭattukayuṁ peṇṇuṅṅaḷe jīvikkān viṭukayumāyirunnu. niṅṅaḷkkatil niṅṅaḷuṭe nāthanil ninnuḷḷa vampicca parīkṣaṇamuṇṭ
